mapper.select: SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail FROM product p, category c WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id

SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail FROM product p, category c WHERE p.category_id = c.category_id LIMIT 6 OFFSET #{page}
SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, c.category_name, image, image_detail FROM PRODUCT p, CATEGORY c WHERE id = #{id} AND p.category_id = c.category_id

SELECT id, name, quantity, price, description, manufacturer_id, c.category_id, category_name, image, image_detail FROM PRODUCT p, CATEGORY c WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND p.category_id = c.category_id
